ValidationRule.description: account name cannot be changed by Sales Reps or Partner Community Users
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(Name), $User.ignore_validation_rules__c = false, OR( AND( CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "Sales Manager"), NOT(CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "Legal Teamlead")), NOT(ISPICKVAL($User.Business_Unit__c, "Sales - Partner Management"))), BEGINS($Profile.Name, "Partner Community")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If you would like to change the name of this account, please contact your administrator.
